definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: The report on this scandal appeared on the front-page of the Washington Post.
sentences.chinese: 這樁醜聞的報道出現在了《華盛頓郵報》的頭版。

sentences.english: Iagree with the judgment of The Washington Post that the publishers quote onthe cover.
sentences.chinese: 我同意《華盛頓郵報》引用書扉頁上的判斷。

sentences.english: That alone was a news scoop which would raise many eyebrows.
sentences.chinese: 這篇報導是《華盛頓郵報》的獨家新聞。

sentences.english: This is evident by the fact he still goes to his seventh floor office at the Post every day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天還去《華盛頓郵報》七樓辦公室上班。

sentences.english: Post officials said Broder died of complications from diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓郵報官方解釋他的死因是糖尿病併發症。

sentences.english: That includes one Cabinet-level official, according to the Washington Post.
sentences.chinese: 據華盛頓郵報報道，一位內閣級官員也涉及其中。

sentences.english: Some journalists are willing to get the exclusive at any cost.
sentences.chinese: 這篇報導是《華盛頓郵報》的獨家新聞。

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician
